Passaic.Passaic County Court House:
The Passaic County Court House complex is located at the seat of Passaic County, New Jersey in Paterson.


== Old Passaic County Courthouse and Annex ==

The Old Passaic County Court House and Annex are located at 71 and 63-65 Hamilton Street, respectively.  The Passaic County Court House was constructed between 1898 and 1903.
